books.author: by Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady describes her journey from the South Side of Chicago to the White House, and how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent.
books.name: BECOMING

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by John Carreyrou
books.description: The rise and fall of Theranos, the biotech startup that failed to deliver on its promise to make blood testing more efficient.
books.name: BAD BLOOD

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by Brad Meltzer and Josh Mensch
books.description: The story of a secret plot to kill George Washington in 1776.
books.name: THE FIRST CONSPIRACY

books.author: by Julie Yip-Williams
books.description: After receiving a terminal cancer diagnosis, a lawyer and mother of two chronicles her life.
books.name: THE UNWINDING OF THE MIRACLE

books.author: by Mary Pipher
books.description: Reflections on the ageism, misogyny and loss that women might encounter as they grow older.
books.name: WOMEN ROWING NORTH

books.author: by Maria Popova
books.description: The achievements and private relationships of several interconnecting historical figures.
books.name: FIGURING

books.author: by Howard Schultz with Joanne Gordon
books.description: The former chief executive of Starbucks recounts his journey to success and shares the inspirational stories of others.
books.name: FROM THE GROUND UP

books.author: by Kerri Rawson
books.description: A woman rebuilds her life after she learns her father is the infamous killer known as BTK.
books.name: A SERIAL KILLER'S DAUGHTER

books.author: by Susan Orlean
books.description: The story of the 1986 fire at the Los Angeles Public Library provides a backdrop to the evolution and purpose of libraries.
books.name: THE LIBRARY BOOK

books.author: by Dani Shapiro
books.description: Secrets and identity in a fast-paced age of science and technology are explored through the story of a woman who discovered her biological father.
books.name: INHERITANCE

books.author: by Chris Christie with Ellis Henican
books.description: The former governor of New Jersey describes his relationship with President Trump and the tensions among others close to the president.
books.name: LET ME FINISH

books.author: by Roger McNamee
books.description: A Silicon Valley investor and mentor to Mark Zuckerberg describes some of the negative effects of the attention economy on our democracy and the greater culture.
books.name: ZUCKED

books.author: by Stephanie Land
books.description: An unexpected pregnancy forces the author to navigate challenges faced by the working poor.
books.name: MAID
